title: As Columbia Folds, Harvard Shows What Institutional Courage Looks Like

description: The Trump administration has just claimed an astounding new power: the ability to deport lawful permanent residents based on their “expected beliefs” (including perfectly “lawful” expected beliefs). title: Marco Rubio Claims He Can Kick Lawful Permanent Residents Out Of The US On The Basis Of Their “Expected Beliefs;” Immigration Judge Says “Sounds Good”

description: Away goes more talent. And away goes another obstacle standing in the way of Kristi Noem’s DHS and Donald Trump’s plans to rid this country of as many immigrants as inhumanely possible. title: Another IRS Commissioner Steps Down After Being Forced To Share Immigrant Tax Records With The DHS

title: Daily Deal: How to Hack from Beginner to Ethical Hacking Bundle

title: Trump Admin’s New Defense For Accidentally Sending Abrego Garcia To Salvadoran Torture Camp: We Meant To Do That

description: Back in March Trump illegally fired the Federal Trade Commission’s two Democratic Commissioners. title: With 3-0 GOP Majority And All Democrats Fired, The FTC Is Now A Total Trump Puppet Agency Pretending To Care About ‘Antitrust Reform’

description: It’s just three months since the Chinese company DeepSeek released its R1 reasoning model. The […]
title: DeepSeek Is Already Being Applied Widely Across China’s Industries, And Used For Government Surveillance And Propaganda
